column5: Wondering if anyone has a report on how fishing has been? Heading up to Mahkwa next Tuesday.
How about a fishing report when you return? We too, fish out of Mahkwa, but later in the year. Would be interesting to see how you approach the lake.Pooch

Had a really great trip to Lac Seul. When the wind was blowing we caught fish, a lot of fish. When the wind died down it was a tough bite. Still ended up with over 250 fish for three days. Not to bad. Used jigs with minnows and leeches and fished 3' to 9' of water. Fish were where the wind was blowing into the shore.
Thanks for the report! Headed north in a week and am ready to "get out of Dodge".Fishing sand, weeds, rocks?Pooch
sand and rocks. Where do you find weeds?
